basic_flat_buffer::operator= (3 of 3 overloads)

Copy assignment.

Synopsis 
template<
    class OtherAlloc>
basic_flat_buffer&
operator=(
    basic_flat_buffer< OtherAlloc > const& other);
Description

After the copy, *this will have an empty output sequence.

Parameters

Name

Description

other

The object to copy from.
